description: Starts an existing experiment. To create an experiment, use CreateExperiment.

parameters.name: analysisCompleteTime
parameters.description: The date and time to end the experiment. This must be no more than 30 days after the experiment starts.

parameters.name: experiment
parameters.description: The name of the experiment to start.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the project that contains the experiment to start.

nested_items.name: startedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the experiment started.
